SideBar.profile: I moved to Tokyo when I was 25, and now I'm 35, living in Kanagawa. I work as a web engineer and became a freelancer at 35. My goal for my 30s is to exceed an annual income of 10 million yen.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.replyMessage:
Thank you for your inquiry.
Please allow us some time to respond.

confirm.title: Thank you for your inquiry to WebCreator Ko.
confirm.message:
Dear {name},
Thank you for your inquiry.
Please allow us some time to respond.

We will get back to you with a detailed response as soon as possible, so please wait a little.

Please note that this email is automatically sent, and we are unable to respond to any replies.
Thank you for your understanding.
